message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As we're just starting the negotiation, I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'll sell the product to you for $12000. What do you think?

I appreciate your competitive offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $10500. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to pay a premium for the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11250. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $11000, but no more. Can you consider my offer?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer the product to you for $11200. This is my final offer before I consider other options. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $10800, but no more. Can you consider my offer?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too close to my minimum price, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $10900. This is my last offer before I consider other options. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $10700, but no more. Can you consider my offer?

I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my last offer and your latest offer. I'll offer the product to you for $10800. This is my final offer. What do you think?

I appreciate your final offer, Alice. However, I've already gone as high as I can. I'm afraid I'll have to pass on this deal. I'll have to consider other options, including buying from John for $15000.
